  <Disclosure>
    <DisclosureButton>Open mobile menu</DisclosureButton>
    <DisclosurePanel>
      <DisclosureButton :as="MyLink" href="/home">Home</DisclosureButton>
      <!-- ... -->
    </DisclosurePanel>
  </Disclosure>
</template>

<script>
  import {
    Disclosure,
    DisclosureButton,
    DisclosurePanel,

</script>
